website_summaries.verdict: High-quality, handmade plush toy that is assembled in the United States. Catnip lovers go crazy for it.
pros: Plush toy is filled with organic catnip, so your cat will love playing with it and chewing on it
Has a variety of textures that will keep cats entertained and interested
Measures 7" long, so it's a perfect size for an adult cat

website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this is a quality catnip toy that makes most felines come running for engaging play.
pros: A handmade toy that is filled with organic catnip
Some owners rave about their cats being instantly attracted to it, and playing with it for hours
Size is perfect for cats to grasp and hold
cons: Not all cats seem enthused by it
Although the material feels reasonably durable, very active cats and chewers can puncture or rip it over time

customer_reviews.title: This is some good s**t
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today. The cat was on me before I could get it out of the sealed plastic. I tossed it on the floor, and Basil, the nip-head, was all over it. While I didn't smell anything, one of the other cats got a contact high! Right now, the one cat who has never been interested in intoxicants of any kind, has taken possession of the 'nanner, and is refusing to relinquish it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: kitties are delighted
customer_reviews.text: A big hit with my two middle-aged kitties, especially on first exposure. The cloth-surfaced toy feels like it's packed with catnip from end to end, quite a difference from smaller toys that are mostly stuffing (or the cheap ones that only have a catnip pouch). If you've never seen a catnip-loving cat react to a fresh, intense new catnip toy (like this one) coming out of the wrapper with a burst of aroma, you owe it to yourself and kitty alike. This isn't the cheapest toy, but even just my black cat's (pictured) first ten minutes with this banana was worth the price. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Siddique

customer_reviews.title: Cat 1 - Banana 0
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and tips for this product. I knew my cat would eventually win the match, but I thought the banana would at least win a couple of rounds. First fight, round one, one punch and it's a knockout!!! (Translation: Day 1 and it's already ripped and now I have catnip all over the floor). One star because Pootie Tang had a good time ripping this up.
customer_reviews.author: D.C. in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the YEOW brand of catnip toys. He has had many of the fish YEOW's over the course of his lifetime and plays like a crazy man until they get old and stale and no longer have the catnip potency they originally did. This banana yeow came and he was hardly interested in it at all. I felt the product had been sitting around and was not fresh therefore my cat was not getting the effect of the catnip and did not want to play with the toy. They're not cheap so this was a big disappointment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: The catnip is very strong in this one.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for a well loved and well slobbered upon Yeowww! catnip banana. All of them I've ever gotten have extremely potent catnip in them, the most potent of any catnip toy I have ever gotten. Eventually any catnip gets old as the volatile oils evaporate and loses its "kick," but they last for a relatively long time. My cat loves his banana and it has already provided many hours of stoned up enjoyment for him. When this one gets old and decrepit I will get him a new one so he can continue to doze in a catnip haze seeing sounds and tasting colors.
customer_reviews.author: BriannaDoe

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrrrrr :(
customer_reviews.text: Just got my kitties banana about a half hour ago.... soooo excited. She is 12 and has never played with toys, Just no interest. I gave her this banana and she went nuts... for about 15 minutes when the seam came open and catnip started coming out in her mouth :/ I had to be an evil mom and take the brand new toy that she was clinging to, out of her paws. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical1

customer_reviews.title: Lasted approximately 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: If your cat is particularly strong or aggressive then they will tear through the toy quickly. Ours put deep bite marks into the fabric within an hour, and by the following day the banana was opened at the seam. Luckily, we found it had been opened before the catnip inside got everywhere. If your cat is clever and full of energy then they will figure out how to open it in no time. Good idea, but poor execution and poor fabric strength.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: It's a dud
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats--one loves catnip and the other ignores it. I had purchased this same catnip banana several years ago and my one cat went bonkers over it for months. I decided to buy a new one--in fact I bought two catnip bananas and two catnip cigars. My catnip loving feline took one whiff and walked away--from all four! Of course my non-catnip loving cat didn't even take one sniff. I don't know if these four items were old or what, but I wouldn't waste your money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's New Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy turned my sweet, gentle, easy-going cat into a little savage! Full-on repeated bunny kicks for a good 10 minutes. My little guy is a rescue, so his actual age is unknown, but he is clearly an older adult. Only a fool would try to pry this away from him, once he clasps his paws around it. :) I bought one but just ordered 3 more. It's just a matter of time before it gets destroyed and I definitely want spares on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A

customer_reviews.title: Really good catnip but...
customer_reviews.text: The catnip in this banana is some good s&*t, it's very potent and smells like tea. But the banana casing is not tough enough for such alluring catnip. My fiance's cat put tiny holes and one more substantial hole in this in less than 3 minutes (probably more like a minute but I'm being generous.) If your cat is really sensitive to drugs, or has really sharp claws/teeth, or is any other kind of aggressive beast, pass on this toy. On the bright side, I have a small banana's worth of good catnip to put in something else for the cat.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: What's in this thing, really?
customer_reviews.text: I had barely started opening the envelope when my girls were doing figure eights around my feet, meering and sniffing madly. That should have been the first clue. I tossed the Yeeow! Banana in the air, and Charlie-the-Ragdoll leaped up to catch it. She was already bunny-kicking it on her way back down, and Maisy-the-Persian tackled her to take it away. These are the two mellowest, sweetest cats imaginable, going completely bananas (c'mon, you saw that coming) over this toy. For comparison, I bought them a Kickeroo two weeks ago. They completely ignore it. The Banana, I think I'm gonna have to order another one to avoid jealousy issues. Best toy ever, according to my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Coinneach Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: What in the banana sorcery is this?!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what kind of magic sorcery they’ve done to create these but all of my cats go crazy for these yeowww toys! Especially the banana! The dogs won’t leave them alone either! In fact, I bought about 10 different ones a few months ago and my dogs stole them all and chewed holes in them and catnip is STILL leaking everwhere! So that was a giant waste of money and sucked immensely. But they are definitely a hit with ALL the animals!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: The Acapulco Gold of cat nip toys
customer_reviews.text: Yeowww catnip toys are a staple in my household. Potent, and quite durable for the most part. Unless you have a little saber tooth tiger with pica, but I suspect most cat owners do not have this problem. Let’s just say that this is a replacement for Yeowww catnip cigars that lasted through quite a few years, and multiple cats, until my special boy came along and taught me why amazon has the option to “subscribe and save” on cat toys. I could smell the catnip in this through the baggie it was in, and through the amazon package itself. The cats LOVE it. My only regret was only buying one.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Looks good - NOT DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to watch my cats enjoy this - however, within an hour stitching was coming undone and from there it was all down-hill. Not durable, not worth the money - so very disappointing - cats had an hour of fun that was all. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Give a Dog a Home

customer_reviews.title: He was super excited as soon as I opened the package and ...
customer_reviews.text: my cat didn’t respond to the cat nip from a previous product I bought, but my cat abosolutely loves this cat nip toy! He was super excited as soon as I opened the package and started rolling on top of the toy next to my pile of amazon packages I’m a first time cat mom and I just adopted my cat two weeks before I bought this. Good product, my cat lays on top of this catnip toy to nap all the time. He actively search for this toy to nap on top of it lol. I’m happy he loves this and I’m happy to see that he’s opening up more and becoming more relaxed in his new home.
customer_reviews.author: Yiyu Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Already torn open in less than 10 minutes?
customer_reviews.text: I never write bad reviews but this purchase just irks me to no end. Not expensive but that isn't the point. Within 10 minutes of giving this to my smallest cat, it was ripped open. I expect that in a reasonable amount of time, but certainly not in 10 minutes :(
customer_reviews.author: Letha Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My cats immediately fell in love with this toy. It got delivered today and I threw it on the ground near them and the picky one went up to it and started licking it which turned to biting which turned to rabbit kicking it for a few minutes until she got tired. She loves it! They did poke some mail holes in it already but it seems like the banana is still going to hold up for a while with he material it is made of. I tried to get one of those flipping fish from another store but that scared my cat so I got her this instead and she's in love!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Steed

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Looking Within Hours
customer_reviews.text: Catnip inside is fresh enough that my two cats really went nuts for this. Unfortunately, the yellow dye used is probably not the best color, as the thing quickly looked a bit greenish where my cat licked it. And after a day, there are many visible holes where the nails went in. A darker color and sturdier fabric would be better. Admittedly, if you don't have a licker, the holes alone may not bother you. Edit: score lowered an additional star as the thing has a dime sized hole in it after a couple of weeks. The drool discoloration is also worse and quite disgusting. Catnip isn't leaking yet, but I'm just going to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Charlie Slater and the Catnip Banana
customer_reviews.text: This catnip toy makes my usually placid cat, Charlie Slater, turn into a kicking, biting, and fighting machine. He loves it! He drags it from room to room. He also pulls at the seams, often leaving a pile of catnip on my bed. Between licking it, biting it and bunny kicking it, the banana is de-catnipped and completely flat within 2 weeks. Now, Charlie is a 'nip head, but his brother, Grant Mitchell (are you Brits and Anglophiles spotting a pattern here?) is completely indifferent, so they're not competing to kick the stuffing out of the poor banana.
customer_reviews.author: lee p.

customer_reviews.title: They love this catnip
customer_reviews.text: We've had a rainbow toy with the same kind of catnip for years. It's the only kind of catnip that the boys really like. Their rainbow is a bit dirty and old so I bought the banana and my Franklin couldn't even wait until I opened the package. I let someone else open it because I wasn't home and he was batting the package off the table! Very potent. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Cats MEOW 😻👍
customer_reviews.text: My cats all 4 love this! I have bought several of these bc of that. It's so funny bc they will play with it then leave it alone. Then you'll see them later walk by it, STOP go BACK look AT the Banana and you can almost Hear it say, "Yo, You TALKING TO ME?... YEAH, I SAID IT. WHAT YOU GONNA DO??!? " Then, lo and behold the cats just FLY AIR ATTACK ON TOP of it biting and kick scratching it!!😂 Saying "DON'T you EVER talk to me that way again! You got it!?!" Hahaha Of course that's the way we feel they feel. LOL You'll see!
customer_reviews.author: 💜Southern Green Eyes 💜

customer_reviews.title: Approved for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my 3 boys and they’ve all loved it! I was afraid it would be totally wrecked in a matter of minutes, but despite have teeth marks and stains from licking, it’s still holding together. I ordered another two so they could each have one, but I ended up giving one to my mom’s blind, geriatric kitty. She loved it too and it smells strongly enough that she can sniff it out after she throws it across a room. It’s managed to get a 16 year old cat to play like a kitten and my teenaged-kitty to focus his zoomies on a toy instead of literally bouncing off the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: 'YeowwW!' makes the best catnip toys, their catnip is incredible!!
customer_reviews.text: I was notified that a package arrived. My cat was sleeping high up in his cat tree when I went to the door. I brought the padded envelope into the kitchen to open it, and the next thing I know, he is by my feet meowing VERY loudly, and VERY insistently!!! 👩: "What, you can smell that already? I didn't even open up the plastic bag yet!" 😸: MEOWWW!!!!!!! I didn't even get the best footage because my phone was in the other room, I had to go get it, LOL 😁 'YeowwW!' makes the best catnip toys, their catnip is incredible!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love This Catnip Banana!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought lots of catnip toys but this banana is the only toy they've loved more than the box it came in. One loved it so much she chewed on a corner seam until she got to the catnip. Will sew it up and return it to the cats. The one thing I don't like, but it doesn't bother the cats, is the sticky paper label. When removed, the stickiness on the fabric gets discolored from dust or whatever it picks up. I had to remove the label because my cats would've shredded and eaten it. I've bought 4 for our cats and get these as gifts for friends with newly adopted cats. Worth its weight in catnip!
customer_reviews.author: beachbum2

customer_reviews.title: Cat ripped it open within 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for our cats as a Christmas treat. They went crazy for the super-smelly catnip, but within 10 minutes one banana had torn open at the seam--and our cats are not the kind to destroy things as a rule. A month later, they don't go near the other banana. Seems to me the super catnip smell wears off fairly quickly. Way too expensive for a toy they won't play with after a few days (not to mention the one we can't use because of the hole in it). I'll go back to the pom poms they like better--I put them in a plastic bag with catnip to "refresh" them.
customer_reviews.author: Bhamster

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it, but it’s not going to last
customer_reviews.text: My cat instantly punctured the toy with his teeth, but he really enjoyed himself in the process. It’s more durable than other toys, but still not as durable as I’d hoped. I can tell it’s not going to last long. He only has had it a couple hours and it looks like someone’s been jabbing it repeatedly with a needle. I’ll probably give the toy another shot, or try a different shape by this brand to see if maybe he was just extra-enthusiastic for the first go-round. I’ll update the review if it lasts longer than I think it will. This might not be the perfect toy for a bitey cat, but they’ll probably enjoy it while it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay N. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: My cats went...well...bananas over it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, with low expectations, to be honest. To my surprise, all four of our indoor cats started a battle royale to see who would be the champion and claim this mighty, cat crack filled banana, as their own. I ended up having to buy them each one, to prevent further carnage in the house. In the end, they were all winners, and we got to take some funny videos of the epic battles, and all of them looking like they had snorted their way into cat nip induced stupors.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: strange toy
customer_reviews.text: I have a strange toy for a strange cat. I have read that so many cats love this toy. I ordered it. For the most part, my cat wont even look at it. But on the occasion she wants to play with it, the catnip must be amazing because she loses her mind and acts like a crazy person. She is so funny and playful when she sinks her teeth into the banana. If that's what you're looking for then this is the toy for you!I wish she would play with it more but she just has to be in the right mood for it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy82805

customer_reviews.title: Love them naners
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these! They do lose their stuffing after a few months, but that doesn't stop the cats from playing with them. Some cats seem to like the floppy ones better. They carry those around, grumbling, like they have a dead thing. I have unused cat toys everywhere, but these never seem to lose their entertainment value, for the cats and me. Watching them act a fool with a banana is hilarious. They will drag these things all over the house. I've found them in my shoes, the kitchen sink, anywhere cats can go. They'll even carry them along to the litter box. Now that's love.
customer_reviews.author: Kinni Peters

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: My Dutchess loved it so much she ripped the bag open with her teeth while I wasn't looking and hasn't stopped chewing and scratching at it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruni

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for a toy the cats love!
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these as a gift and ours cats love them so much that we have them on subscribe and save to ship quarterly. The cats play with them frequently, including holding them in their front claws and kicking with the back and we have never had one break open! The only downside I can think of is that if a cat licks them a whole bunch they start to turn green which is more weird and kind of gross than it is an actual problem. I would highly recommend these. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: CacoethesScribendi

customer_reviews.title: Cat Fight over the Banana.....!!!  VIDEO
customer_reviews.text: I woke up this morning, having forgotten to open a package that got delivered the day before. I put it in the house on a table before going to bed. The cats opened the box themselves. I saw this when I went into my office (I work from home). The banana was still in the plastic package, but with holes all over. I threw the banana outside the office and Sweet Pea (a.k.a. Sweepy) starting bunny-kicking it. Then Sam decided he wanted a hit, and they play-fought for it. Our other cat, a Mackerel Orange Tabby, was already sacked out on the bed. Cats have a great sense of smell.
customer_reviews.author: Techno-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA organic catnip. My cat loves them!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my cat's favorite brand for years. He prefers the bananas and cigars. Very durable and stands up to his big pointy teeth and bunny kicks. I'm very particular about his toys and these are Made in USA and filled with potent 100% organic catnip inside natural cotton fabric with safe naturally derived dyes. Personally I like the bananas the best because he sometimes falls asleep with them under his chin and they are the perfect shape for a kitty chin rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Doh

customer_reviews.title: The cats are happy so I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a hit with all three cats! Even my boys who usually don’t care about catnip toys. They don’t get to play with it though, because my female is hogging it. She likes to hold it in her mouth and cry loudly. Within 10 minutes of giving it to them, it was soaking wet with cat saliva and had deep teeth punctures. The material held up pretty well to the abuse though. Time will tell how long it is before any seams rip, but I am hopeful because it seems quite well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Cats favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this for my cat after she stayed at our pet sitters and played all day with one of these bananas there. This is by far the greatest toy I have ever purchased for her. She just spent the last 2.5 hours playing with it with no breaks. Normally she sticks with a toy for about 10 minutes before returning to a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: She loves her banana
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn’t usually play with toys. She’s about 8 years old and I’ve had her for 4 years. She loves this cat nip filled banana! I had never really introduced her to cat nip and apparently she likes it. A lot. She’s had it about a month and so far it’s held up to her biting and this scratch-kick-rub thing she does. I’m just monitoring the fabric to make sure nothing is coming through and will get her another banana when this one can’t take anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sakurayoshii

customer_reviews.title: All my cats go bananas for the banana!
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats and all of them go insane for this toy. They rabbit kick it, toss it around, chew it, and sniff it. Despite all the abuse this toy gets, they've never broken. Of course, they lose their potency after a while but they are inexpensive to replace. It's the best catnip toy ever made and if my cats love it then do so I!
customer_reviews.author: Maya S.

customer_reviews.title: Catnip Dealer
customer_reviews.text: This product is as it is described, a yellow banana filled with catnip. The catnip inside must be very potent because stray cats tore up the package before I got home, but my cats accepted what was left. It has been a few months now with the banana and my only issue is the mess. Because my cats have torn it open, I find catnip all over the house when I come home. It looks like an overzealous weed dealer decided to invade my house. The cats love it though. Won't buy again because I can't deal with the mess, but it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mejia

customer_reviews.title: High quality toy, will have to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Omg. This is LEGIT. It came packaged in a clear plastic bag, and I wrapped it for a christmas present for my kitties. For a week before Christmas, I kept finding the wrapped present in different places, as the catnip was SO POTENT that through the wrapping paper and plastic bag, the cats still found it and started ripping into it. After they finally got to open it, they were even rolling around on the wrapping paper .. highly recommend fantastic, super high quality toy and potent cat nip! Big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: My Preciousssss
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple packages arrive. When I brought them into the house my cat had a particular interest in one. She was going bonkers. Once I opened it, I realized it was the powerful banana. The catnip was so potent she could smell in through the box!. I took it out and she was in heaven. I have never seen my 8 year old cat respond to a catnip toy like this. She will not let it leave her sight. If she's not high as a kite bouncing off the walls she has it close by. I'd give the banana 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice I had to order twice
customer_reviews.text: The cats were going crazy before it even came out of the package. I ordered one for my cat who is in boarding and had it sent to my friends house. Well... the cats at the house ripped into the package and stole the first banana! I never even saw it. They took it and were stealing it from each other and hiding it. I have seen cats go for catnip. I've seen how they react. This is some NEXT LEVEL catnip. When I got the second one, an outside cat tried to "claim" the package. Thankfully it was intercepted and hidden.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved it but destroyed it
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved this toy and it’s a great size for a kicker toy. However, it is not durable at all and he destroyed it within two days. The first day, his nails and teeth left holes all over it that caused the catnip to start coming out all over the house. By the second day, it was so ripped up we had to throw it away because the catnip was everywhere making a huge mess. He’s a 7 month old kitten so I would have expected this to hold up to him.
customer_reviews.author: books 101

customer_reviews.title: Highly fragrant; Repeatedly my cats’ #1 toy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this numerous times. Over the years, all five cats of mine have chosen this as their #1 favorite toy. Nothing else even comes close! The product is consistently of high quality and jam packed with highly fragrant catnip that drives my cats wild. And these are securely sewn. Despite my cats chewing or sucking on this, I’ve never had one break open. They do, however, have a tendency to get discolored at the ends after extensive use, but that’s from my cats chewing on them. It’s not a limitation of the product. HIGHLY recommended! — I paid Amazon’s listed price for this product. I was not paid or otherwise compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Lizfish

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I follow a lot of IG cat accounts and they all talk wonders of this toy. My cats are not fans of cat toys... they are all laying around. They like my scrunchies. So I bought this to try and as soon as I opened it, one of my cats was all over it and bunny kicking it, she loved it. The other one was playing with the plastic bag it came in. They had it for a day and I can tell it will not last long. I am planning on ordering more though!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Leiro

customer_reviews.title: Instant good times
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this treat for the cat while I was buying some other items. It showed up in two days to an Amazon locker. The price seemed to be lower than my previous purchases elsewhere. It was instant good times as soon as the bag was opened. Lucky whooped on that thing for at least an hour before passing out and sleeping on it. It seemed to be just as good the next day. Usually she will slop the other ones up in one session and it is over after that but this one continued into the next day. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Best cat nip toy I have ever seen my Cat love
customer_reviews.text: ThIs toy is amazing. I have never seen my cat love a toy like she does this one. It's not to big or too small. She loves the cat nip. Its fresh cat nip bc it comes n a plastic zip loc bag. The fabric on it is thick enough so when she holds it and kicks it at the same time she is not going to demolish it. Bc she loves it so much that when I see her stop going to it first thing then that will tell me the cat nip must b done with inside and I will buy her another. I forsure recommend this toy for ur cats.
customer_reviews.author: MaDaM MeZeLLe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent catnip. Toy so so.
customer_reviews.text: Great catnip. Toy meh. You can smell the stuff through the plastic packaging in the box. My cats love the catnip. My new cat however is a little bit bigger and stronger and he destroyed this latest banana in 10 minutes. (Photos taken after 10 min) My wife then sewed it up and it lasted another week maybe?. If a big strong cat is going to bite this and beat the snot out of it; what do you expect? It is fabric. It’s eventually going to rip up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Howard loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Best cat toy!! We have my adult son's cat with us temporarily, and got him this toy for a Christmas gift. Howard is an older, sort of lazy cat whose main hobby is sleeping....a lot. This toy is bringing out the kitten in him, and he's even sleeping with it! So adorable. He's even possessive of it! My own cat tries to play with it, and Howard is right on it letting her know it's his! We've been having a lot of fun with him and his banana toy. I will be buying more for sure in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Genealogy Nut

customer_reviews.title: Either mine was defective or it's garbage
customer_reviews.text: My cat opened a hole on this banana in less than half an hour playing with it. I can't even return it to Amazon because I had catnip all over my floor and threw it away. Considering all other reviews are very good, maybe mine was defective. UPDATE: Amazon gave me a refund, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Knight Lord

customer_reviews.title: Crack for cats!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very finicky cat because not much excites her in the way of cat toys. However, this banana makes her go crazy. We have bought several other toys with catnip in them and she could care less. She will play with this banana several times a day. She actually seeks it out. She digs her claws and teeth into it and it takes a beating but it hasn't ripped or tore open. It is very durable. We have had for several months. I just purchased 3 more. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: terrifictigger

customer_reviews.title: Cute catnip idea.
customer_reviews.text: Interestingly enough, my male cat LOVES this catnip toy while my female barely acknowledges it. Go figure! It is a very cute toy idea though. I guess you can never tell with cats as they are such connoisseurs of practically everything. I can never predict what they will either like or dislike so I keep trying. As long as one of my two Siamese cats is happy with the toy it is well worth the effort. Now I am off to find a different catnip toy for my female cat. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's some sort of tea or if I am just actually smelling catnip for the first time but as soon as I opened this it had that odor to it. Upon grabbing it -- it felt that it was just packed with whatever I'm smelling. If it is catnip then that is just an overwhelming amount of it. But I don't think it was catnip as my kitten is typically very fascinated with cat toys with cat nip but he really did not care for this one. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Janoe

customer_reviews.title: Bananas for the Banana
customer_reviews.text: Two of my kitties absolutely fell in love with their bananas. They now look so scroungy the I decided Christmas was a good time for replacement. I also ordered one as a gift for my friend's kitties but don't know their reaction yet. As for my cats, one of whom is 3yrs and the other is 12yrs, although the youngest has favorite toys never had either of them reacted to a catnip toy before. Now I know why there are so many rave reviews. Add mine to all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Connie of GATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought my cats two different catnip toys for Christmas, this one and one that looks like a hot pepper. Of course, both cats love the same toy, the banana. I don't know if it's the organic catnip or what but they both claimed it as their own. I also bought one for my nephew's cat and he told me that his cat loves hers too even though she has a lot of other toys. Great item for a great price that your cat is going to like. Would buy again and might have to.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia V

customer_reviews.title: Our cat’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason this yellow banana catnip toy really entertains our 11 year old female cat. We’ve got several of this brand but this one is our cat’s favorite toy. I tied a shoe string to one end to pull it around for the cat to chase and she rabbit kicks the crap out of it when she catches it. One supposes that if I tied the string to the green fish model we might get the same reaction.
customer_reviews.author: GuyMc

customer_reviews.title: May or may not last...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second banana I've bought. The first one held up like a champ for months. It started getting just "beat up" looking from being abused non stop by my cat so decided to get him a new one. Got the new one, and within hours, there was a tear at the seam so the catnip was just falling out. The price is right, but, guess the quality is hit or miss and kitty loves these stupid nanners so I'll probably buy again and hope it lasts as long as the first one did.
customer_reviews.author: Techy21

customer_reviews.title: my cats new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: this thing is PACKED with catnip!! not like other toys. my cat is crazy about it and hasnt lost interest over time....i bought a few for my moms cats and they love it too. i bought it because several people in my cat group were raving about it...they were right!
customer_reviews.author: geneveve

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! This is what QUALITY does!
customer_reviews.text: The small health food store by me sells (well, sold) quality, bulk, locally grown cat nip. And it is obvious. The cats react to it. The cats get excited when the word "catnip" is uttered. I order another brand from Amazon before this. Not low cost. The cats were like "meh". The cats stopped getting excited at the word "catnip". I ordered this, and wow. Very happy cats. They love this toy. Well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ordog

customer_reviews.title: #1 Catnip and Cat Toy
customer_reviews.text: This catnip is extra special. Have had mine for years that's still going strong and got another for travel and one for a friends cat. Seriously the best for catnip obsessing, licking, and bunny-kicking. My cat does not bite or claw at the toy so there is no saying this would hold up to that. (She has her canines and claws still). She's an 8y.o. Siamese and isn't too catnip obsessed but loves to kick and lick this thing for a few minutes to get her fix. She prefers this banana over the rainbow one for some reason. Highly recommend you give this toy a try. Haven't met a cat yet who doesn't like this banana.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Grosman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: If your cat is jonesin' for a fix... this banana will blow their head off. My special needs cat has anxiety and tends to hide under beds. Not anymore. I have her so hooked on this product, she is always in the middle of the floor begging for a hit. You wont be disappointed. I have been buying these bananas for going on 8 years and the potency is like no other.
customer_reviews.author: @iarekitteh

customer_reviews.title: Best value & greatest cat kicker catnip toy ever!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST CAT TOY EVER!!! My cat is 6 & likes very few toys,very picky., I've made most of hers. Wanted to engage her....since it arrived 5 days ago, she plays with it half hour several times a day, the. She guards it, and falls asleep on it!! My son's gf cat is younger & even more obsessive since she got one as my gift. I'm buying 4 more to keep on hand!!! Best part ..it's less than half the cost of all the other catnip kicker toys out there 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne W.

customer_reviews.title: My cat opened the package
customer_reviews.text: Before I could even surprise our new rescue cat with this adorable catnip toy, he took matters into his own hands! I’ve ordered other toys similar to this in the past but this was the first time any of them wanted what was in there so badly, they tore the package up to get it. Like, he full on opened the yellow bubble mailer, ripped open the plastic bag it was in, and removed the banana without me knowing. It’s still his go-to toy when he needs to expend an hour of energy at 4am.
customer_reviews.author: It's Me Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality catnip toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat lost her mind over this! This has some Pablo Escobar class catnip inside. My cat was covered in drool and entered another dimension after playing with this. It did however fall apart quite quickly due to my cat’s crackhead like enthusiasm.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Hunter

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I never know how my cats will react to the toys I buy them. Often with a complete lack of interest. The minute I took this out of the packaging they were on it, which means to me that the catnip was very fresh. The thing I really like about it is the size and shape. Just right for grasping with the front paws and kicking with the back feet. I've had it a couple of weeks and they continue to play with it. So far it shows no sign of falling apart although it is covered with punctures. I will buy another when this one gives up the ghost.
customer_reviews.author: BAF

customer_reviews.title: BEST CATNIP TOY EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Each Christmas I used to get one for my two fur kids and they loved it sooo much they’d break into their stocking if not put up! Since we got Dangeruss (2yrs now and 13😳POUNDS a polydactyl tuxedo) who loves it as much as the other two combined we need a replacement by March! This year I took the excuse of valentines and have 3 extteamly happy kids with their shiny new banana - stuffed FULL of nip and shape allows hours of tossing play complete with the backpeddle WILL BUY AGAIN AND AGAIN! One of best kitten gifts to new parents ever!
customer_reviews.author: tawny martel

customer_reviews.title: Super-nip!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased catnip for this kitty before but never got a reaction like this from her! She absolutely loves this and goes GONZO when we give it to her to play with. It seems very fresh and the banana is stuffed with it. The only caveat is for some reason, our Golden Retriever thinks it is for him so we put it back in the zip-loc bag it came in and give it to her the next day.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: No joke, best $6 I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely dumbfounded at how much my cats love this banana. It has been weeks, and they still stop and roll around with it on the daily. I have two cats. One loves nip, the other can take it or leave it. Both of them are obsessed with this banana. If it ever runs out of nip or stops being effective or whatever, I 100% no question will buy more. We got our $6 out of this thing within minutes of having opened it and thrown it to the cats. Best value I've ever gotten from a cat toy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best catnip toy
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE these catnip toys. Tried to put them in there Christmas stockings bit the cats kept figuring out how to get to them because they were so obsessed with them. Strongest catnip toy I have ever found! I like that they are long to so my cats can really wrap their arms around them and kick like they like to do. They get really gross over time from all the slobber they get on it but have never torn either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must
customer_reviews.text: My little baby kitten loves this toy. He did not hesitate to play with it at all. Loves the catnip toy. Great toy for any kitten and have all their energy taken out on this toy! Watch the video to see proof. Super cheap. Yes, it will destroy soon, but it’s a TOY. Meant for that. Your kitty will thank you and you will get the joy of watching your kitty be happy over this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenates cats and then a fetch toy for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this banana every time I see it or find it. It’s a hit with my smaller cat as she cat carry it and roll around with it. My senior cat licked it and would be rejuvenated by it. I recommend this banana. I would buy again. The home shelf life is approximately 2-3 months before they loose interest. My dog takes over at that point and we play fetch with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea why, but it’s my cats’ favorite
customer_reviews.text: My cats all go bonkers for this banana. All of them, even my senior cat, turns into a kitten when the banana comes out. They play with it all the time, as I find it in different rooms throughout the day. It’s durable, which is nice, and takes maybe 6 months of fully clawed play before they’ll destroy it and deposit catnip everywhere. It’s a bargain, really.
customer_reviews.author: Nightfall

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think cats liked bananas, but this one is different...
customer_reviews.text: Yup, the catnip banana has been here all of 5 minutes and our cat is in love. She won't leave it alone- it's already covered in cat slobber, and she's alternating between rubbing it with her face, hugging it, and trying to rip it open. It's a much better size than most (smaller) catnip toys, it seems like she can really sink her claws into this one. I'll be back to rate the durability since she's giving it a very thorough test.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: MEOWIE OUT
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 STARS All five cats absolutely loved YEOW catnip stuffed banana. YEOW banana is great cat nip product and lasted bout hour BEFORE getting torn. SIDE NOTE I do wish the seems of the YEOW banana would be double stitched so when they do kick the heck out of it would hold up a bit longer. All five kitty kicked the crap out of it! The last one did rip the seem. Will order more YEOW cat nip toys.
customer_reviews.author: -SweetNSour_

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these bananas (one for each cat) after another person raved about their cats loving it. I figured I’d give it a try, as my older cat doesn’t play with toys much anymore. As soon as I pulled it out of the bag, she was all over it and going crazy. It’s been all around the living room tonight and now, the other cat is sleeping with hers. Big win in my book. It’s very well made and seems like it will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best catnip toy period. Your cat will LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best catnip toys available, the banana shape is great for a cat to grab and kick at, and the catnip is super potent! My cat will grab it and lick it until it's wet as soon as it comes out of the package. I typically replace mine after a month or so (just because it has been so heavily licked by kitties) but they last along time. I have some over a year old they still go to and kick around. These are the best catnip toys you can get your cat. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: TheFestivaGuy

customer_reviews.title: One cat and it was ripped to pieces in an hour.
customer_reviews.text: It's made of some type of VERY cheap felt -- as soon as his saliva got it wet it disintegrated all over the place. And of course he ate some of it and got sick on it. It wasn't even recognizable and I'd only given it to him an hour before!
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: If you want a happy cat who is high as a kite this will ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, my kitty absolutely loves this nanner, BUT it made him NUTS! I let him play with it for about 10 minutes as he was getting really aggressive/whacked out. It wasn't until almost a full day later that he started acting normally. Not sure if it's the organic nip that is so powerful or if the product just contains a lot of nip but it does the job. If you want a happy cat who is high as a kite this will do the trick. :) It is a nice toy with nothing to harm kitty which I appreciate (no glued on parts), and also came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: HoityToity

customer_reviews.title: Last 3 Yeowww toys don't smell as potent and cats aren't as interested
customer_reviews.text: My cats really love Yeowww catnip toys but... I have purchased several Yeowww catnip toys and my cats are obsessed but the last 3, including this one, that I purchased they are not as interested in. The smell does not seem to be as potent as even their older Yeowww toys. I'm not sure if Yeowww has changed their product or if I'm getting a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware can turn ur little kitty into a mean cat!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this toy wouldn’t advise anyone to buy. My Cloe just fell n love ❤️ He became very Possessive and aggressive. I’ve never seen him behaving n this way. I’ve bought him toys with catnip before & never did the catnip make him act out. I think 🤔 it was a different type of catnip but I’m not sure. I wouldn’t recommend this toy to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: shirley reed

customer_reviews.title: CATS ARE OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: You guys. My cat was OBSESSED with this toy. So much so that he was drooling all over the package it was sent in and the other items in the box with it. There was drool everywhere, and my cat was so happy. But unfortunately, my cat clawed/bit it and it only lasted about a day before the interior catnip started spilling out everywhere. So 10/10 would purchase again, hopefully they can make it more durable, but just know it might be a treat-for-a-day-only.
customer_reviews.author: AAnz

customer_reviews.title: My cats love love love this! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these for our cats for Christmas. They loved them. Tried to get them right through the wrapping paper. They have bitten, kicked, tossed, attacked and bunny kicked this thing for months now and while it is a little flatter than when we got it is has not leaked any cat nip. You can see where their teeth have bitten it but they are more like indents than holes. They have been out for 3-4 months and they are still playing with them. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W

customer_reviews.title: Loki Loves Yeowww Banana
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cat toy ever. Loki plays with once a day or whenever it crosses his path. He carries it around, bounces on it, throws it up in the air. The catnip is still effective, not too much or little. To renew I plan to place catnip in a plastic bag with the banana and store for a few days. It worked with other toys. I sent a video. Please watch it to the middle where he is most active with it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dabelms of Bensalem

customer_reviews.title: Older cats acting like kittens!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, my cats love these things!!! I had 1 for about 5 months when i finally had to replace it cause it was a mess but be sure i replaced it with a new 1 for each kitty b4 i threw it out. And the new ones are very fresh. Right now both cats are goin catnip-crazy as they are rolling around with their new toys. I got the banna & the rainbow. They love them both. My cats are 7-8 years old and it is fun to see them acting like kitties. These are their favorite toys ever! :)))
customer_reviews.author: Ilene S.

customer_reviews.title: mmm Bahamamama
customer_reviews.text: (sorry for the Firesign Theater reference)... we buy the odd catnip toy for our professional barn/home cats and usually they disdain them as perhaps some kind of kitty "health food"--but this... THIS... my serious, normally self-contained 24 pound black tomcat grabbed this and rolled right off the couch whilst gripping it with all four paws! It is getting shredded after a few weeks, but it's survived longer than most such things--my guys are very fit hunters and few things survive their claws for long. I (and my cats) give this two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Grand cats are in love!
customer_reviews.text: While visiting my daughter and son-in-law, I placed an Amazon order to get a few things, Among them was the catnip Banana. When it arrived, "Alice Boo" and "Morty" were kooky over it! I opened the package and tossed the toy in front of the cats, where Morty snagged the banana and started rubbing and rabbit kicking it. Alice Boo attacked the bag the toy came in and loved the heck out of it! Needless to say, fun was had by all!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Conyers

customer_reviews.title: I'll have to limit his exposure to have the toy last longer
customer_reviews.text: Already (after my calico got tired of playing) he's punctured the toy several times with his teeth. I'm sure this means along with his elated behaviour this toy is a hit. But for me I want it to last longer than a single hour, so I have to take it away periodically. Cats give 5 stars. I give 3 stars. Combined = 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ingold

customer_reviews.title: Yeowww! That's potent stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We love Yeowww! We just moved to a new home so I decided to freshen up their nanners. They still have & play with the old ones; but after more than a year and a couple of machine washings they aren't as potent. Seeing my kitties so happy with these toys makes me happy! They are our #1 stop for toys & fresh catnip; which i use for so many things!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Kel

customer_reviews.title: FULL of catnip. Very potent. Cats LOVE this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister's cat, and the catnip was so potent that he started going wild before the Amazon box was even open! It really is entirely filled with catnip, unlike some toys that just have a small amount of catnip mixed in with stuffing. He absolutely loves it. The exterior is a durable canvas-like fabric, so they can't tear it open. The only potential drawback of this toy that I can think of is that you can't really wash it without destroying the catnip, but I don't usually need to wash my cat toys anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lisak

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat is really picky with toys, and she loves it. It continually gets used and she doesn’t get tired of it. Due to its size, it doesn’t get lost under a couch or bed, never to be seen again. She is kind of shy but loves playing with this toy and it must have enough catnip in it that it keeps her interest over time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R2R2

customer_reviews.title: Yay for the crack banana
customer_reviews.text: All my cat loving friends have been raving about this banana and sharing how much their cats love it. I finally caved and got for my kitties. Instant win and my youngest fluff ball was rolling around, drooling as soon as I took out of package and gave to her. I’ll probably have to order extras in case her sister comes around and decides to love it as well
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Feelings of love and hate in 1 banana
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved this but they chewed through it in about 2 hours it was destroyed with catnip everywhere. So needless to say if the cats were writing this review they would give it five stars but since I am the one who paid and had to clean up I give it 1 star. My cats are not normally destructive but this they loved to much!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Please read before buying the banana!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a HUGE hit! I literally just got it yesterday and my cat has never reacted to catnip like he did with this. With that being said...buy their loose catnip. This banana didn't last 10 minutes for my cat before the seam ripped open 2 inches. Luckily I was right there to see it happen so I swooped in and grabbed it up right away before all the catnip fell out. I'll use the nip for sock toys instead. I did go back and order 5 of their 2oz containers of loose nip. This stuff is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: wasn't out of the package and cat went for it.
customer_reviews.text: cats went crazy for this. it wasn't out of the box but still in its plastic bag on the kitchen table and one cat knew it was there and went for it right away. I took it out of the package and put it on the floor and she went crazy. when she was done, the next cat played for a while now the third cat is taking a go at it. so far it seems pretty durable but with 2 bengals and 2 dsh cats it might not last that long. we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: ncymae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat toy..strong catnip!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift because my cats went wild for this toy when I brought it home from the pet supply store. One of my cats would take the new banana toy, rub, & and slobber all over it. The toy held up, but the green catnip showed through the fabric & made it turn green. Whatever the type of nip they use, its potent! My cats would play with these repeatedly, too, making it a lasting toy. I now order & give them to all my friends who have cats!
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: The One Toy to Rule Them All
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what kind of crack cocaine they put in this banana, but ALL THREE of my cats are OBSESSED. I had to buy 2 more so that they each could have one because they seriously brawl over it. I know there is catnip in it, but they freak out over this banana like they have NEVER done for any other catnip toy. They scratch it. They bite it. They bunny kick it with their back feet. They roll around all over the place with this banana. And honestly, it’s absolutely hilarious to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super reccomend!! At first I questioned buying a toy banana for a cat lol but my roommates cat was fixed a few months ago n recently started meowing as loud as she possibly can right at my door..... this was an instant hit and an instant life saver! As soon as i showed it to her she sniffed if out, n it was a wrap. Shes been playing with it non stop! Keeps her quiet and entertained and everyone else happy! Lol Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: My cat now knows the word "banana"
customer_reviews.text: These products seem to have a very potent or special kind of catnip -- my cat is largely indifferent to raw catnip or other catnip toys, but loves the Yeoww line, and especially this banana, I think because she can hold it with her front paws and kick it with her back paws. She knows very few words but learned "banana" quickly and months later still gets so excited to play with it. Probably the best cat toy I've ever gotten her, aside from spaghetti.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy They Actually Play With!
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats are 10+ years old and rarely play with toys anymore... until we got this! No idea why they love it, but it's HANDS DOWN the best toy they have ever had! They play w it daily. Normally they wouldn't care after a few days. A month or so in and they still play with it at least 1-2 times a day. Buy this thing if you love your cats :)
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: If you gaze long enough into the banana...
customer_reviews.text: She liked the hell out of it for the first 90 minutes, now she just bites it because she doesn't want to disappoint me. I probably should have gotten her a cell phone... Update: I'm giving it that fifth star because it's now her go-to chomp toy when she's mad or happy (hard to tell the difference). I think the change came when I put it on a mat, as the stone floor may have been too cold for sustained assaults. It's pretty disgusting looking at this point, but it's still holding up without a tear (nails are trimmed, however). Bravo, Banana, bravo.
customer_reviews.author: PepperJay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, Cats LOVE it, but could be more durable...
customer_reviews.text: I will say this much: my cats LOVE this toy. However, after only a few days it's already covered in holes from nails and teeth puncturing the fabric. I'll have to replace it within a few weeks, I am sure, but I will probably buy again just because the cats REALLY love this thing (all three have been fighting over who gets to play with it).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Anne Arnold
